alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 1:44PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Walton and southwestern Washington Counties through 145 PM CST... At 1242 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Santa Rosa Beach, moving northeast at 20 mph. Ed Walline Beach Access gusted to 34 mph at 1232 PM CST. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Live Oak, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Hinsons Crossroads, Portland, Blue Mountain Beach, Seaside, Rock Hill, Millers Ferry, Gulf Pines, Knox Hill, Bunker, Grayton Beach, Sandestin, Four Mile Village, Red Bay and Douglass Crossroad. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
